headline: Software Developer | Focused on JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Node.js
summary:
I'm a Software Developer with over seven years of experience building Web Solutions focused on JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Node.js.

I like coding, building software, and continually learning and expanding my knowledge to write better code and build better solutions everyday.

I consider myself to be a very self-organized person that pays attention to small details, especially when I am building UI. Throughout my career, I have had the opportunity to work with many technologies. I have mostly work with JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Node.js, but I also have experience with React Native, Redux, GraphQL, Apollo Client, styled-components, Bootstrap, Sails.js, prisma.io, Firebase, MySQL, MongoDB, AWS, Solidity, PHP, Angular.js, ElasticSearch, and many other frameworks/libraries/databases.

› Company: Arlene (start up)
› Role: Software Developer
› Description:
› Tech-stack: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Sass, Svelte, Node.js, Fastify, Firebase, Three.js

› Company: None (Freelancer)
› Role: Software Developer
› Description: I currently work on different projects as a freelancer. In addition, I have been a consultant to other programmers in different companies
› Tech-stack: React, TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind CSS

› Company: HelloBuild (digital products development)
› Role: Software Developer / Lead Software Developer
› Description: HelloBuild is a company focused on offering development services. I worked on several projects as a Full-stack Developer, and as a Tech Lead in the last stage. I had the opportunity to build some projects from scratch and work on other projects by contributing to its development and maintenance
› Projects:
  - Credit Unions Services: A services platform oriented to support Credit Unions operation. This project had several Web Apps, React Native apps, Lambda services, and Node.js back-end applications. I worked here giving tech support for the team and designing some features like Authentication, npm packages distribution, and coding guidelines
  - Projects Management Tool: A tool oriented for the building sector. I started to build this web application from scratch using Next.js, Apollo Client, GraphQL, and prisma.io. I worked as the Lead Software Developer along with other 3 developers
  - Job Searching Platform: Web application similar to LinkedIn. Our team built the front-end application based on Next.js and TailwindCSS and the client team built the back-end. One of main challenges was the implementation of the authentication using Auth0 (Authorization Code Flow) and Redis
  - Babies mobile app: This app is related to child care. Users were able to track when a baby needed medicine, food, and many other things
› Tech-stack: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, React Native, Node.js, TailwindCSS, Next.js, GraphQL, Apollo Client, Prisma.io, AWS

› Company: None (Freelancer)
› Role: Software Developer
› Description: I worked on multiple projects which were usually web applications. During this time, I started to get professional experience with React, React Native, and Redux
› Tech-stack: React, React Native, Redux, Node.js

› Company: Festa (start up)
› Role: Junior Software Developer
› Description: Festa was a platform to listen to music from YouTube and create collaborative playlists among multiple people. I joined this company as a Junior Software Developer to migrate its MVP from a monolith PHP and jQuery application to a Single Page Application based on Angular.js, Bootstrap Material, and Firebase. I worked mainly in the construction of the SPA and I also contributed to the development of a back-end application based on Node.js, Sails.js, and MongoDB
› Tech-stack: JavaScript, Angular.js, Bootstrap Material, Node.js, Sails.js, MongoDB, Firebase (realtime-database and auth)
